sentence.Network_en: The nation was led astray by a mountebank.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个国家被一个夸夸其谈的骗子引入歧途。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... paramount a 最高的，首要的 mountebank n 江湖骗子 tantamount a 同等的，相等的.
英语骂人话_蔡勇_新浪博客 ... moujik 帝俄时代的农民 mountebank 江湖郎中，骗子 pockmark 麻子.
老外提出难题_英语杂谈... ... 讲江湖义气- be loyal to brotherhood 江湖医生- quack;mountebank 江湖骗子- swindler;charlatan.
he went instantly the prison , descended to the cell of the " mountebank , " called him by name , took him by the hand , and spoke to him .他立刻跑到监狱去，下到那“耍把戏的人”的牢房里，他叫他的名字，搀着他的手，和他谈话。

list.abs: To act as a mountebank ., 走江湖卖假药.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Italian montambanco, from the imperative phrase monta in banco! 'climb on the bench!' (with allusion to the raised platform used to attract an audience)

means.word_mean: 1. a flamboyant deceiver; one who attracts customers with tricks or jokes

auth_sentence.content: Theatrical, not to say charlatan and mountebank, politics.
auth_sentence.res_content: Theatrical, not to say charlatan and mountebank, politics.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Theatrical, not to say charlatan and mountebank, politics.

auth_sentence.content: There is no more melancholy creature...than a mountebank off duty.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is no more melancholy creature...than a mountebank off duty.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is no more melancholy creature...than a mountebank off duty.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不能克服的,难以对付的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+surmount克服+able可以……的→不能克服的
para类似+mount登上,山,安装→类似高山→最高的
mounte=mount登上+bank=bench→登上长椅[卖假药]→江湖骗子
dis去,下+mount登上,山,安装→从[马上]下来
re重新+mount登上,山,安装→再次登上
